title: Toy Story
overview: A story of a young boy and his toys come to life.

title: The Lion King
overview: The adventures of a young lion prince as he struggles with adulthood.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic former Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: A Batman movie where Bruce Wayne faces the Joker in a high-stakes battle for Gotham's future.
